title: D604 AI CarBox
metaDesc: Powerful D604 AI CarBox MDVR for centralized fleet video surveillance and intelligent data processing.
fullDescription: Designed for non-standardized industries (ride-hailing, logistics, construction vehicles), supporting 4-channel HD video, multi-mode positioning, and AI safety systems (DMS/ADAS/BSD). Compliant with Chinese Ministry standards for versatile applications.
features: HD Video: 4x AHD 1080P/720P input, H.265/H.264 encoding, CVBS output
AI Safety DMS: Driver face recognition, fatigue/distraction/smoking/obstruction detection (requires DMS camera)
AI Safety ADAS: Forward collision, lane departure, pedestrian alerts (requires front camera)
AI Safety BSD: Left/right blind spot alerts (requires BSD camera)
Precision Positioning: GPS/BeiDou/Galileo multi-mode (optional RTK with 0.02m accuracy)
Flexible Control: 4x input/1x output IO, 1x RS485 + 1x RS232, external sensor support
Stable Power: 9-36V wide voltage input, <3W power consumption

parameters.label: Interfaces
parameters.value: 1x RS485, 1x RS232, 4x In / 1x Out IO, CVBS Out

packaging: 1x D604 MDVR, 1x Power Harness, 1x I/O Cable, 1x GPS Antenna, 1x 4G Antenna
